summary:
- The meeting focused on reviewing the progress of the Q1 roadmap and identifying any blockers.
- Key updates included the near completion of the UI design phase, with some screens pending final review and approval.
- The team discussed the status of backend integration, noting that several APIs are still pending implementation, which could impact the overall timeline.
- There was a consensus on the importance of finalizing UI feedback by the end of the next week to avoid delays.
- The discussion highlighted issues related to unclear ownership, which has led to bottlenecks in previous sprints.
- The team acknowledged the need for focused efforts on backend integration to facilitate timely completion of the project.
- The next meeting will serve as a checkpoint to validate the progress of both UI and backend integration efforts.

decisions: Finalize UI design by next week.
Assign backend integration focus to Ali.
Review overall progress in the next weekly meeting.
Track risks related to UI feedback delays and backend dependencies.
risks: Delays if UI review cycle is slow.
Risk of backend API readiness impacting integration timeline.
notes: Emphasized clear task ownership and quick follow-up.
Next meeting will validate completion of UI and backend integration progress.
